backend/main.mo: Actor module handling plan creation, updates, queries, and enquiry submission with access control and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor shapes and initializing an empty plans map during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, theming variables, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount point, meta tags, and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component implementing hash-based navigation between the home page and the LIC Plans page with dynamic metadata updates.
Marketing About section displaying advisor values and a detailed 'Why Choose Me' feature list with icon cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays the contact section with advisor contact details and embeds the ContactForm component.
Implements a validated enquiry form that submits user details using a mutation hook and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQ.ts: Renders a list of accordion-based FAQs about LIC policies with questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Displays the site footer including branding, quick navigation links, contact details, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Renders the hero section with a headline, CTAs, trust indicators, and a feature image, with smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Navbar: Provides a responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, smooth section navigation, and a mobile menu.
Renders a grid of insurance plan cards with features, popular highlighting, and a scroll-to-contact button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays a list of insurance service cards with icons and descriptions plus a visual icon set image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidate queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlans.ts: Hooks for fetching, creating, and updating plan entries through the backend actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit enquiries by mapping form input to backend types and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config defining theme variables, dark mode palette, global styles, and premium table utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LICPlans.tsx: Admin-only page to upload plan images, run OCR, create plan metadata, and display existing plans with navigation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/ocr.ts: Provides simulated OCR processing and parsing of extracted text into structured plan data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Basic validation helpers for required fields, email format, and optional phone numbers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, features, and pending requests for the plan upload and OCR system.
